QuestData.Title: Guile of the Raptor
QuestData.Description: The highland fleshstalkers to the south are even fiercer than the others of their kind. They possess not just strength, but true cunning.$B$BWhen I was trapped by lethargy, even the amulets of strength failed to move me. But Tor'gan used the hearts of the fleshstalkers to imbue me with spirits that conquered my doubt, freeing me.$B$BOur soldiers deserve the guile of the raptor. Collect the fleshstalker hearts for me, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 12 Raptor Hearts from Highland Fleshstalkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: My preparations are made, all I need are the raptor hearts.
QuestData.RewardText: As Tor'gan taught me, I transfer the power and the spirit of the raptors into this orb. It will imbue our warriors with the fiery strength and intelligence of the raptor.$B$BThe guile of the raptor is yours now as well, $c. Take it with pride, for the Horde!
